TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit FontStretches extends System.Object
public ref class FontStretches abstract sealed

Docs.summary: 提供一組靜態的預先定義 值。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 字型縮放描述的字型表單會自動縮放從其一般外觀比例，這是原始的寬度和高度指定的字型中字符的比率。
<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches>值會對應至`usWidthClass`中的定義[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)]規格。 `usWidthClass`代表 1 和 9 之間的整數值。 較低數字的值表示較窄的寬度。較高的值表示較寬的寬度。
|字型縮放|usWidthClass|一般的 %| |------------------|------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraCondensed%2A>|1|50%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraCondensed%2A>|2|62.5%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Condensed%2A>|3|75%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiCondensed%2A>|4|87.5%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A>|5|100%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A>|5|100%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiExpanded%2A>|6|112.5%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Expanded%2A>|7|125%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraExpanded%2A>|8|150%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraExpanded%2A>|9|200%|
如需有關[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]`usWidthClass`值，請參閱["字型檔案資料表 」](http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/otff.htm)區段[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/includes/tla2sharptla-opentype-md.md)]規格。

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.FontStretch Condensed { get; }
.property valuetype System.Windows.FontStretch Condensed
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Condensed As FontStretch
public: static property System::Windows::FontStretch Condensed { System::Windows::FontStretch get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Condensed%2A> 代表 75%的一般字型表單的外觀比例。

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.FontStretch Expanded { get; }
.property valuetype System.Windows.FontStretch Expanded
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Expanded As FontStretch
public: static property System::Windows::FontStretch Expanded { System::Windows::FontStretch get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Expanded%2A> 代表 125%，一般字型表單的外觀比例。

Public Shared ReadOnly Property ExtraCondensed As FontStretch
public: static property System::Windows::FontStretch ExtraCondensed { System::Windows::FontStretch get(); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraCondensed%2A> 代表 62.5%的一般字型表單的外觀比例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraExpanded%2A> 代表 150%的一般字型表單的外觀比例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A> 表示字型格式的一般 （100%) 外觀比例。 值<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A>相等的值<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A>。
